ygData.subject: Re: Weapon choices..
ygData.msgSnippet: Initially put a really fast weapon in your off hand to get your dual skill caught up.  The gnoll hide lariat comes to mind (speed 20) or tentacle whip (speed
ygData.messageBody:
Initially put a really fast weapon in your off hand to get your dual
skill caught up. The gnoll hide lariat comes to mind (speed 20) or
tentacle whip (speed 26).

As for interupting casters the anemic damage we do rarely seems to
interupt NPC casters as I approach 20. As for PC casters I guess you
can still do it.

Is Tallon the one where they are going to make it no0item looting? We
group may switch to that server and make our halfling army. (Warrior,
rogue x2, druid x2, cleric)
--
We now return to the non-stop rock.

Matt DeBarger
